ingredients.title: Ingredients
ingredients.content:
Dandelion Root*, Chicory, Chaga*, Dates, Ceylon Cinnamon*, Maca*, Reishi*, Cordyceps*, Brahmi*, Shatavari* 

*ORGANIC

brew-guide.title: Brew Guide
brew-guide.content: Add 1 heaped Tbsp (10g) to 250ml of freshly boiled water in a French press and brew for 5-10 minutes. Add milk of choice — straight or frothed — and sweeten if desired. Delicious served hot or cold. One serving can be brewed up to 3 times. Give the used grinds to your plants - they love it!

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.content: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. Shipping takes 2-5 business days. All packages are carefully packed to ensure your brews arrive in perfect condition. For returns, please contact us on info@veera.co.za.
